org.kepow.economysim

Class CustomConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.kepow.economysim.CustomConfig

  • public class CustomConfig
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to represent a custom config manager. See: http://wiki.bukkit.org/Configuration_API_Reference (Accessed 2015-05-20)
